attributes.action: Increase the fines for littering across the UK
attributes.additional_details: There are more people voicing their concerns of rubbish being left in public spaces, near their homes and around their communities. If fines were increased, it may be a deterrent. More of the public are taking it into their own hands to litter pick in their areas to try and clear other people’s mess.
attributes.background: If fines were more costly then it could encourage the public not to litter across the environment, and take better care of public spaces, communities and outdoor spaces.
